cluster_relations.rel_desc: Butterfly species determine variation in the size, shape, and color of eggs.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject biological taxon determines specific phenotypic traits (e.g., size, shape, color) of the object life stage or structure.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Butterfly Life Cycle Organisms and Host Plants

qualifiers.ConditionExpression: egg size, shape, and color depend on the species
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Traits affected: size, shape, color of eggs

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Caterpillars display a variety of body shapes.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a taxon or organism group shows variation in a specific morphological attribute or dimension (e.g., shape, size, color) across individuals or species.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Caterpillars display a range of body sizes.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a taxon or organism group shows variation in a specific morphological attribute or dimension (e.g., shape, size, color) across individuals or species.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Caterpillars display a variety of body colors.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a taxon or organism group shows variation in a specific morphological attribute or dimension (e.g., shape, size, color) across individuals or species.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Some caterpillars show twig mimicry as a behavior.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an organism or life stage displays or performs a specific behavior or behavioral strategy (e.g., camouflage, mimicry).

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Purpose: to camouflage themselves from predators

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Some caterpillars show leaf mimicry as a behavior.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an organism or life stage displays or performs a specific behavior or behavioral strategy (e.g., camouflage, mimicry).

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Purpose: to camouflage themselves from predators

args.justification: The 'exhibits_behavior' predicate describes active behavioral strategies (twig/leaf mimicry) performed by caterpillars rather than static morphological attributes. Mapping these to the broad group 'AGENCY' better distinguishes active behaviors from structural or color/size traits that remain under 'ATTRIBUTE', improving semantic clarity between morphology and behavior relations.

executed_decisions.justification: The 'exhibits_behavior' predicate describes active behavioral strategies (twig/leaf mimicry) performed by caterpillars rather than static morphological attributes. Mapping these to the broad group 'AGENCY' better distinguishes active behaviors from structural or color/size traits that remain under 'ATTRIBUTE', improving semantic clarity between morphology and behavior relations.
